transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir, Global Healthcare se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji, main, ji sir.
Executive: Ji mam, main baat kar raha tha senior manager Indiamart.com se. Kese hain aap?
Customer: Ji, haan ji, haan ji, badhiya sir, aap sunaiye.
Executive: Main thik hu mam, thank you for asking. Mam aapne call kiya tha customer care ko services ke regarding, abhi aur kuch.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, sir, maine, mam, main pic vagera toh add kar pa rahi hu, lekin PDF add nahi kar pa rahi sir ab.
Executive: PDF add nahi kar pa rahe aap? PDF mein kitne jyada MB ki PDF hai isliye is vajah se kya dikha raha hai woh?
Customer: Nahi, ji, ji, sir, whatsapp pe woh maine check nahi ki kitne MB ki hai, maine bheji thi.
Customer: 107 number last hai, us number pe maine whatsapp dala tha woh. 7.4 MB hai sir woh.
Executive: 7.4 MB hai last mein.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, 7.4 MB.
Executive: Haan ji. Hello?
Executive: Ji, haan ji, haan ji. Thik hai woh add ho jayega mam, PDF main aapki add karwa deta hu. Kitne maximum sare products ki hai aapki?
Customer: Haan ji, ji sir, woh sare products ki hi hai.
Executive: Thik hai woh mention main karwa dunga usme add PDF. Thik hai woh karwa dunga. Koi issue nahi. Baki abhi jaise mam last time aapka discussion chal raha tha isme premium services ko lekar.
Executive: Toh abhi interested, kya matlab services ke liye aap woh discuss karna cha rahe the, kis type ka services aap cha rahe hain abhi?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, maine toh kuch aisa nahi bola sir.
Executive: Accha, accha, last, last aapka concern reach tha na premium services ko lekar. Abhi aap keval Haryana mein Karnal mein deal kar rahe hain mam, all over India deal kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, abhi toh Haryana mein hi hai sir.
Executive: Aapka Haryana mein hi hai. Toh yeh mainly aap apne brand mein sell out kar rahe hain mam, air pressure spray aur yeh sab apne hi koi.
Customer: Haan ji, ji, apne brand mein, GST ke.
Executive: Accha. Toh mam apne brand mein agar aap ja rahe ho toh aap apne kya naam hai as apni website ke sath jao toh woh jyada benefit beneficial rahega aapke liye. Website mein market mein aapki.
Customer: Kaise keh rahe ho, samajh nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Main bata raha hu jaise aapka Global Healthcare hai, thik hai, lemon grass aapka brand hai. Thik hai, Global Healthcare aapka company ka name hai. Toh aap isme apni website ke sath jao jaise ki globalhealthcare.com.in.net. Is naam se. Abhi aapka kya promotion kya hota hai www.indiamart.com/globalhealthcare. Sub domain chalta hai abhi aapka. Agar isme aap apne own domain ke sath jaoge matlab apni khud ki website ke sath jaoge jaise ki bade bade sellers aapki karte bhi hain. Aapne bio pharmaceutical ka naam suna hoga Noida, Gurgaon aur Delhi ke top supplier hain.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Toh woh apni website hi run karte hain mam. Toh isme aapki website rahegi usme aapki goodwill banegi market mein aur usme aap easily dusre distributor bhi reach out karwa sakte ho. Matlab all over India se aapke paas.
Customer: Aap karoge, nahi, nahi, aap karoge usko ya mujhe karna padega idhar se?
Executive: Website toh mam hum hi banate hain. Abhi website jo aapki aapki services chal rahi hai na usse upar wali services website hoti hai. Abhi aapki basic service chal rahi hai. Thik hai, jaise ki maine kya naam hai isme abhi aapko aapka same number whatsapp pe hai jispe baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, yahi number whatsapp pe hai.
Executive: Ek bar spell out karenge mam number, ek bar spell out kijiyega.
Executive: Aapka yeh primary wala number ek bar spell out kijiyega.
Customer: Nahi, kya karna hai sir isko?
Executive: Number bataiye, ek bar number bataiye aapka primary wala. 8199.
Customer: 8199 42
Customer: 071
Executive: 071. 819942071.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Right mam? Dekhiye maine aapko haan, hi bheja hai abhi, open hua?
Executive: Aur maine ek link bheja hai yeh jo company hai yeh same apni website run kar rahi hai. Toh aap dekh paoge ki website kis tarike se means woh run hoti hai India Mart par. Yeh B2B website hai inki.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Yeh hai aur iske iske alawa main aapko dusri bhi bhej deta hu jo ki aapki industry mein hi yeh log hain jo ki website apni chala rahe hain.
Executive: Yeh dekhiye.
Executive: Ek yeh website hai aur ek yeh hai aapki. Thik hai? Yeh dono website hai aap inpe click karke bhi dekh sakte ho ki kis tarike ki website apni run kar rahe hain. Toh yeh mera suggestion hai aapko ki agar aap all over Haryana deal kar rahe ho, thik hai? Toh usme aap apni website ke sath deal karoge toh ek jyada aapki performance aapki goodwill ban payegi market mein near by aur kafi means aapke distributor bhi jud payenge ki aap as a brand promote karoge apni website pe toh kafi distributors bhi aapke directly jud payenge.
Customer: Sir sir iske bare mein, dekho mujhe iske.
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Main keh rahi hu mujhe is website ke bare mein kaise main isko jodu, kaise kaam kare isme mujhe jankari nahi hai.
Executive: Main bata raha hu isme aap jaise abhi aapki basic service chal rahi hai. Yeh jo aapka catalog chal raha hai na yeh aapki basic services hai Indiamart ki isse upar wali service aati hai maximizer. Thik hai sir.
Executive: Iski jo cost iski website ki jo posting jati hai woh ek saal ki aapki 70000 plus GST jati hai. Aur isme two plus haan two plus one ka abhi offer chal raha hai matlab do saal ke price mein aapko teen saal ki services isme mil jati hai. Toh lagbhag 130000 plus GST mein yeh services aapko teen saal ki mil jayegi. Accha matlab iske liye bhi charge dena padega abhi dusra.
Executive: Haan. Haan ji, haan ji. Uske liye aapko charge dena padega jaise ki aapne kal bhi Flipkart se shopping ki hogi mam Flipkart aur Amazon se right? Ji ji Flipkart se Flipkart agar aap search karte ho koi bhi product toh Flipkart assured karke ek supplier sabse pehle aate hain. Flipkart assured suppliers. Aur yeh Amazon pe search karte ho toh aap Amazon fulfilled supplier sabse pehle aate hain. Toh isi tarike se Indiamart ki maximizer services us way mein use hoti hai. Toh koi bhi product aapka search karta hai all over India toh usme aapka jo catalog hai as a trust seller aur as a maximizer seller waha par visible hota hai mam. Toh abhi aapki aap aapki city mein jaise aap ek jante bhi honge Mokshita Enterprises hai jo deal karte hain abhi agar aap jante ho toh. Haan ji. Yeh bhi same aapki services hi use kar rahe hain. Mokshita wale hain. Aur bhi log hain jo ki dusri city se Mumbai se aakar ya phir Delhi se aakar aapke waha par deal kar rahe hain. Ek Shah ki trader jinki maine website aapko bheji hai Mangalam Agro hai. Aur bhi kafi sare hain Sadhi Star Care company hai toh yeh sare log waha par aakar aapka aapki services matlab inhone premium services le rakhi hai toh waha par unki listing hai mam.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai wohi wohi suggestion aap ek bar isme plan kar sakte hain agar aapko budget allow karta hai toh jo bhi amount aapne diya hua hai na ek saal ka woh pura amount usme adjust bhi ho jayega mam. Thik hai. Thik hai? Main ek bar detail quotation aapko share kar deta hu. Thik hai mam? Aur aap ek bar go through kar lijiyega kuch bhi confusion rehti hai toh aap mujhe reach out kar lena directly.
Customer: Thik hai. Bhej dijiye aap sir.
Executive: Ji. Abhi maine kuch PDF add on kara diye hain aapki yeh maximum. Thik hai sari? Ab so yaha par aapka ticket open ho gaya tha toh abhi main isko close kar raha hu. Aapko koi bhi concern rehta hai aap directly mujhe whatsapp kar sakte ho. Isi number pe call bhi kar sakte ho mam. Thik hai? Ji ji. PDF ke alawa toh kuch aur add on nahi karana mam aapko? Nahi, nahi, abhi sirf PDF hi sir. PDF hi add on karane hai. Thik hai yeh maine kara diye hain maximum. Thik hai isko close kar raha hu aapke paas ek feedback aayega mam please usko satisfied se reply kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Okay mam, thank you, have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to add PDF to profile.

- Wants information on how to use website.



Resolution:

- Executive added the PDF for the customer.

- Executive explained benefits of premium services.

- Executive shared website examples for reference.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a detailed quotation.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pdf, website, premium services, subscription
